DOC.detailed_description: Great advance make manage pediatric cataract last several decade ; advance contribute decrease incidence postoperative complication improvement visual outcomes.Early cataract removal replacement intraocular lens ( IOL ) represent appropriate treatment avoid irreversible amblyopia.Although screen timely surgical intervention play key role improve best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) among pediatric patient cataract , determine prognosis individual remain difficult , particularly unilateral cataract . Few study focus interocular difference ocular anatomic parameter axial length unilateral pediatric cataract surgery , significance possible interocular visual functional difference remain unclear . Therefore , investigator conduct cross-sectional study compare bilateral anterior segment parameter , macular thickness , BCVA 3 month uncomplicated unilateral pediatric cataract extraction primary IOL implantation explore possible interocular difference possible relationship .
